Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: வேண்டாமை அன்ன விழுச்செல்வம் ஈண்டில்லை ஆண்டும் அஃதொப்பது இல்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: No glorious wealth is here like freedom from desire; To bliss like this not even there can soul aspire.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A humble ascetic, owning nothing but a simple robe, sits in serene meditation. An aura of pure, golden light radiates from him, representing the true wealth of non-desire.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Behind him, a powerful king sits on a massive throne, surrounded by mountains of gold and jewels, yet his face is filled with anxiety and dissatisfaction. Golden chains subtly bind him to his throne.
Layered_Composition.Background: A vast, peaceful landscape surrounds the ascetic, while the king is enclosed within the dark, oppressive walls of his treasury.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A visual contrast between the material wealth that brings bondage and the spiritual wealth ('விழுச்செல்வம்') of non-desire ('வேண்டாமை') that brings true freedom and peace.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The golden chains on the king symbolize the prison of desire. The ascetic's radiant aura symbolizes the supreme wealth of contentment.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: Serene, enlightened, contrasting materialistic anxiety with spiritual peace.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The king's treasury is dark, with harsh, metallic glints of gold. The ascetic is bathed in a warm, soft, divine golden light that illuminates the natural world around him.

Technical_Cues.Camera: Wide cinematic shot, using depth of field to focus on the ascetic while showing the troubled king behind.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, photorealistic, with fine details on faces and textures.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dramatic chiaroscuro, contrasting the inner glow of the ascetic with the external, harsh light on the gold.
Technical_Cues.Art_Genre: Digital painting in the style of classical realism, with mystical elements.

Negative_Prompt: happy king, sad ascetic, modern clothing, blurry, oversaturated colors, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations in the ascetic's aura.
